documents.document: On my way to Lismore @ResearchSCU and looking forward to running #Turbocharge Publications and Thesis and orientation for new PhDs #phdchat
Looking forward to time with UTS teaching intensive staff talking about fitting writing into a busy day @utsnewsroom #ecrchat #turbocharge
@small_reynolds this was the tweet https://t.co/z0CGrQkNzF
.@SleepGutsHealth I think this is the best way to write grants. A bit of Buzz and Elsa is always a good thing for the creative juices
.@DavidHobbs08 so only robots with no children and/or friends can be top scientists? Not in my experience
@DrSachaSB @UNSW @FranklinWomen great job Sacha. So glad you got on it and got it done.
.@DavidHobbs08 @WriteThatPhD @PhDForum @PHDcomics @Dissertating @elfriesen @TiaCummins1 @AcademicPain love it and agree with it
.@NataliaVeles excellent! We will be back at JCU in July and Nov 17. And they like your idea of a masterclass for previous attendees
.@NataliaVeles at least it is a beautiful garden. May you PhD be so beautiful!
@ClementJessicaH in Australia I would say a manuscript ready to be submitted for publication
Merry Christmas to our wonderful New Zealand friends https://t.co/Xt9drnzKA9
@kate_hayward_ @UBC @ithinkwellHugh we would love to!
.@DrScienceLover @sahmriAU yes great to talk about research and researchers. U can't have a coffee with us but u can watch us enjoying ours!
.@AmyMilka great. And don't forget to park on the hill so you are ready to go next time.
@DrScienceLover love it. Wish I wasn't rushing around so much that I could think up something witty to write.
Yes, I agree completely. Or as I would put it - write a story for a 10 yr old, then write, read, write, read etc https://t.co/zOSwq1v1DD
Mike Bull was so very generous with early career researchers. Such a kind and genuine person. I was terribly saddenâ€¦ https://t.co/10LEjfGreV
.@Hypocaffeinic great to hear. Keep it up and let me know how you get on
.@ithinkwellHugh and I very happy to sponsor the People's Choice award for the 5 minute research pitch #5RP won byâ€¦ https://t.co/Mytud1zFRP
.@Lizzie_Towl I promise to pay more attention in your drop, cover hold demos in future and to never call it drop, stop and rock ever again
Time to be on the other end for a change. Off to @Swinburne for @TheOtherKellyM PhD confirmation #proudsupervisor
Yep, I agree with the FBI. So you know what this means - writing comes before emails each day! #acwri #ecrchat https://t.co/bN2QJR2qSB
@GillianSGould I usually say go next one down. But if feedback from reviewers is constructive & u can make the changes u could try hi again
Just reading PhD student evals of defeating #selfsabotage workshop and found this lovely comment. Nice to be promisâ€¦ https://t.co/VT7b3BmWAw
.@DrRussellBrewer fantastic news and well done.
It is hard. So yes regular short sessions make it easier https://t.co/oVUA11G1nd
A week of workshops for PhDs @MonashUni. See grad research website. All the top hits #7Secrets #turbochargewritingâ€¦ https://t.co/lmNaAfEnmE
I wonder how many in this group experienced #impostersyndrome Based on my experience with high performers- probablâ€¦ https://t.co/oYw1vigopl
Fantastic news Gillian - very excited for you https://t.co/zhPyeZQf5G
A fabulous visit to @ResearchSCU and special thanks to the fabulous Margie from @SCULibrary. Such an asset to SCU staff @Geraldine_Mac16
Go Buffy! I love Trisha and her work https://t.co/Vy0Td2MLxU
Great to be back @ResearchSCU with a full week of workshops https://t.co/syrKSiI1Yq
@TheOtherKellyM this looks interesting https://t.co/aQTfrXPJ4A
Big congratulations Gillian. Very well deserved https://t.co/HsudVSaNcv
#cystic fibrosis. A terrible disease and so glad we have great researchers working on it. https://t.co/KNqUHvCibu
My mentor, supervisor, co-author, person who taught me to write for publication and be a better researcher. Most ofâ€¦ https://t.co/zXkLLIyHDR
.@BronwynHemsley not in my opinion. Law of diminishing returns. Take time off and reprioritise when recovered -ie jettison less impt stuff
@howlingdingo I'll let you know how it goes. I only want it for my scientifically sanctioned napping and sleep monitoring.
@howlingdingo vibrates and wakes u up when u fall asleep so u learn to fall asleep. Do for 1hr for 5 nights Torture but works apparently2/2
@howlingdingo I signed up for the info and they sent me a pretty detailed email. It is sleep retraining. The little device on your finger1/2
Just took part in my first crowd funding campaign for a product. https://t.co/GTED4PvCDj
Some great workshops coming up @CDUni Check out Cognitive Behavioural Coaching for High Performers Tue 9am Red9.1.45 https://t.co/3WxkHjilte
.@reef_scientist @Alharborne very normal to feel that on your first day. Just remember that feelings are not facts-evidence is on your side!
Get a lift on a Monday morning and expose yourself to some culture at the same time https://t.co/ujLKSc0aol
.@LareenNewman @unisaresearch @UniversitySA @DrSiobhanBanks wow that stat is going straight into our Shameless Self Promotion workshop
@.joelrmcgregor that is awesome. Keep in touch and let me know how you go.
.@reef_scientist it is a work in progress. See how you go tomorrow. This is experimental stage to see if morning or afternoon works best
Be productive and then knock off instead of starting the day with email and then dragging out the day to catch up https://t.co/cXm6ZwKWEg
.@reef_scientist @GriffithARI awesome. Sure Bella is very grateful. Let me know how you go (ps wear sunnies in the late pm - sleep better)
I might have gone on a bit long with my narrative 2/2 https://t.co/i0zBDDfNsi
When you get stuck with your narrative speak it aloud. Kent the Aus Cattle Dog doing a great job listening 1/2 https://t.co/0VKVEwhbeE
HDRs and ECRs @UON_research come and find out how the secret to high quality research lies in the narrative 2pm Tue https://t.co/MQvrOOvdgJ
Hashtag research @DrScienceLover @wessidepraxis by some great researchers https://t.co/aZSoPWUsMl
Very much enjoying working with this wonderful group of future research leaders @FU_Research https://t.co/5WEOdo5Tpd
.@DHLangbecker hating emails is another good reason to leave them until last
Looking forward to running Positioning yourself for Creative Funding @waiteresearch @tinabianco 9.30am Tuesday https://t.co/Ie66RHzDU0
Looking for an innovative PhD and a way to make a difference? https://t.co/hWYeCRdcgk
@BronwynHemsley great to hear and looking forward to talking soon
.@BronwynHemsley learning not to say yes while analysing frittata. Well done!
.@SuEgan4 great to hear. Stay in touch and let me know how it goes
.@moninya @ @SuEgan4 @UNSWScience great let me know how it goes
Off to @CQUni @appleton_CQU to work with amazing ECRs. Writing is on today-narrative is what improves quality! https://t.co/ABCD1l6BgR
Yes @reef_scientist @GriffithARI it's not how long you sit at the desk or spend in the lab. It's the output that matters #ecrchat
.@Karen_P_Best yep and the jumbo jet closest to landing is as good as any #ecrchat
.@Nadine_Painter @GriffithARI lets get the tube & balls working right so we can fit a life in too #ecrchat #phdchat https://t.co/ByxlngQ6Qv
Very much looking forward to talking to the Women in Research Network @UNSWnews @SuEgan4. 120 registered! 10am Wed https://t.co/vswO97kyyI
.@IvankaPrichard great. How did it go?
Hope to see lots of new HDR students @VicUniWgtn on Tuesday. Always a fab event run by the wonderful @Lizzie_Towl https://t.co/1va1Nmq6aL
PhD supervisors @UnitecNZ Auckland 9.30 Mon Let's see if we can take some of the lows out of the ride-for them & you https://t.co/oT7wIYZhGp
.@donnelley best tip is to pick one new strategy that really appeals and give it a red hot go. Don't try everything at once #ecrchat
.@DrScienceLover @JamesTamplin halve the number of meetings, do your work first and whatever time is left do emails (as a treat!) #ecrchat
.@DavidHobbs08 @ithinkwellHugh @FlindersCSEM @FU_Research @Flinders @FlindersLib @ScienceChiefAu Agree. I think is our job to promote this
@sciencechloe I am sure it is the latter ðŸ˜Š
Brand new workshop @unisaresearch @UniSAnewsroom Wed 1.30 Positioning yourself for Non-Traditional Funding #ecrchat https://t.co/M5uSlo7Smo
A double header @unisaresearch @UniSAnewsroom this Wed. 9.00am Cognitive Behavioural Coaching for High Performers https://t.co/nSUQWhtOLR
.@LareenNewman I can absolutely believe this. It is the model we use in our coaching. It provided motivation and accountability #ecrchat
Good to know https://t.co/dwO1yaDrXk
@julesette thanks. I will have a look at it.
@LareenNewman. I would like to promote it to my workshop participants
@LareenNewman when are you running this? Goes with the one I am running at unisa next week positioning yourself for non traditional funding
.@LareenNewman @TheTattooedProf I call it reporting to the shareholders #ecrchat
.@LareenNewman @TheTattooedProf I strongly encourage ECRs to promote their work. I see it that the taxpayer paid for it so get it out there
@sciencechloe never mind. I will be back a couple of times next year as well as at a lot of other unis. Am sure we'll catch up at some stage
@sciencechloe congrats on being so close - very exciting Staying at Jesmond. Waiting for final program - will let u no. Hugh running SSP.
.@sciencechloe you're at UoN aren't you? If so I'll be there running Turbocharge your Writing on Tues Sept 13th 2pm. Be good to see you
@DavidHobbs08 very sad to read this. Not the sort of life anyone wants to lead. Postdoc life is very hard
.@NataliaVeles yes writing it down is better but it can feel yuck because now everyone can see how "bad" your are. Feelings are not facts!!
.@bluecology @GriffithARI great to hear Chris. Can't wait to see how everyone has gone when I come back in a month
.@simonrogersNZ @ResearchSCU @SCULibrary @SCUonline thanks Simon. Yes it truly does work for most people. Good luck and let me know how u go
@DrScienceLover thanks for your wise and soothing words. All sorted. Nana times ahead! https://t.co/WSc8HbfwWc
.@DrKirrilly I agree completely
.@geochemista thanks Ellen. It was a lovely group to work with
.@kirstenbenkend @ResearchSCU lovely to see you today Kirsten after all these years and chuffed that I am the subject of your first tweet
A room full of supervisors waiting to hear the #7secrets of highly successful RHD students @ResearchSCU https://t.co/jVk71Di3Qp
.@LareenNewman @DeanHristov this agrees very much with my exp. Similar for ECRs who also need to publish early in their career #ECRchat
.@DrNatOsborne give it a go and see what happens. Very unlikely anyone will email you and say "hey, I don't like you doing that"!
I heard it from @appleton_CQU, but not sure where it originally came from https://t.co/3Ved8Oxz8U
#WomenSTEM session on Shameless Self Promotion or as I call it Reporting to the Shareholders Wed 9.30 @Griffith_Uni https://t.co/V5G0KE9xQV
.@reef_scientist the answer for tardy admin is "I'm working on papers". Make sure you still do impt admin. Just leave the less impt stuff
@reef_scientist @GriffithARI excellent Emma. Clearing the skies in reef research!
